page.title: 12SAMPLE SURVEY OF CHILDREN
page.content: In a survey of children at Ivanhoe High School:_ 50% live in Ashby 87% live in a house of which 50% are semi_detached 75% have lived in the same house for more than 5years 5%have lived in at least 4 other houses 100% have a bicycle 43% of their parents have 1 car 17% of households have motorbikes 20% visit Leicester regularly 56% visit Burton on Trent regularly 6% have never been to London 1% of parents go to work by bus 63% go by car to work 90% of houses have more than 1 TV 56% of children have their own TV 97% of children can swim 87% belog to a Public Library 30% go abroad for their holidays
